Package io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.util.io

Class HttpUtils

java.lang.Object
io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.util.io.HttpUtils
public final class HttpUtils extends Object
Provides utilities for performing HTTP requests.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    HttpUtils.FetchOptions
    Contains settings that defines the behavior of fetchSync(String, FetchOptions).

  • Method Details

    • httpGetSyncS

      @Deprecated(since="v3.12", forRemoval=true) public static final String httpGetSyncS(URI endpoint, org.apache.http.Header... httpHeaders) throws UnsupportedOperationException, NullPointerException, IOException
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Synchronously performs an HTTP GET request to a given URI endpoint.
      Parameters:
      endpoint - The URI endpoint to send the request to.
      httpHeaders - Any HTTP Headers you might wanna include in the request.
      Returns:
      The response from the server, in String format.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - If HttpUtils is disabled in the TCDCommons's config.
      NullPointerException - If an argument is null.
      IOException - If an IOException is raised while performing the request, or if the response code does not end up being '200'.
      See Also:
      • isEnabled()

    • httpGetSyncB

      @Deprecated(since="v3.12", forRemoval=true) public static final byte[] httpGetSyncB(URI endpoint, org.apache.http.Header... httpHeaders) throws UnsupportedOperationException, NullPointerException, IOException
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Synchronously performs an HTTP GET request to a given URI endpoint.
      Parameters:
      endpoint - The URI endpoint to send the request to.
      httpHeaders - Any HTTP Headers you might wanna include in the request.
      Returns:
      The response from the server, in a Byte array format.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - If HttpUtils is disabled in the TCDCommons's config.
      NullPointerException - If an argument is null.
      IOException - If an IOException is raised while performing the request, or if the response code does not end up being '200'.
      See Also:
      • isEnabled()

    • isEnabled

      public static final boolean isEnabled()
      Returns true if the TCDCommons's config enables HttpUtils.

    • fetchSync

      public static final org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse fetchSync(String url) throws NullPointerException, UnsupportedOperationException, URISyntaxException, org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException, IOException
      Same as fetch(String, FetchOptions, Class), but with default HttpUtils.FetchOptions.
      Parameters:
      url - The String representation of the endpoint that will accept the request.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException
      UnsupportedOperationException
      URISyntaxException
      org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
      IOException

    • fetchSync

      public static final org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse fetchSync(String url, HttpUtils.FetchOptions options) throws NullPointerException, UnsupportedOperationException, URISyntaxException, org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException, IOException
      Synchronously performs an HTTP request to a given endpoint.
      Parameters:
      url - The String representation of the endpoint that will accept the request.
      options - The HttpUtils.FetchOptions containing information about the request.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException
      UnsupportedOperationException
      URISyntaxException
      org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
      IOException
